text: the fix for this is deployed now
<@U26BLKGE4> just out of curiosity, what's in their hubdb table and are they using it for dynamic pages?

This one is being used for a resource center, no dynamic pages. The client simply wants to be able to have a custom sorting order that isn't necessarily tied to a logical column value. Right now we have a "custom sorting order" column to get around this, but it makes editing the data a less-than-ideal experience.
